pullRequest.title: Modify !coreinfo command to output the "java.vm.name" property of a core file

nodes.bodyText:
I suggest this should be presented (on one line) like JAVA VM VERSION:
out.println("JAVA VM NAME\t- " + properties.get("java.vm.name"));

nodes.bodyText: There used to be a blank line between the JAVA SERVICE LEVEL INFO section and the PLATFORM INFO section, but with the removal of the  + "\n" that blank line is gone.
